flavorText:
"It's so cute when it's sleeping, isn't it? Actually, it's still as abhorrent as ever, but at least it's not trying to kill us."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

foreignData.flavorText: „Es sieht so süß aus, wenn es schläft, oder? Nun, eigentlich ist es so abstoßend wie immer, aber zumindest will es uns gerade nicht töten." —Noyan Dar, Ruhezauberer aus Tazeem
foreignData.name: Narkolepsie
foreignData.text:
Kreaturenverzauberung
Falls zu Beginn eines Versorgungssegments die verzauberte Kreatur ungetappt ist, tappe sie.

foreignData.flavorText: "Es adorable cuando duerme, ¿no? En realidad, es tan horrible como siempre, pero al menos no intenta matarnos." —Noyan Dar, mago arrullador de Tazeem
foreignData.name: Narcolepsia
foreignData.text:
Encantar criatura.
Al comienzo de cada mantenimiento, si la criatura encantada está enderezada, gírala.

foreignData.flavorText: « C'est tellement mignon quand ça dort, hein ? En fait non, c'est aussi abject endormi qu'éveillé, mais au moins ça n'essaie pas de nous tuer. » —Noyan Dar, ataraxmage de Tazeem
foreignData.name: Narcolepsie
foreignData.text:
Enchanter : créature
Au début de chaque entretien, si la créature enchantée est dégagée, engagez-la.

foreignData.flavorText: "È così carino quando dorme, vero? O meglio, è ripugnante come al solito, ma almeno non cerca di ucciderci." —Noyan Dar, mitigatore di Tazeem
foreignData.name: Narcolessia
foreignData.text:
Incanta creatura
All'inizio di ogni mantenimento, se la creatura incantata è STAPpata, TAPpala.

foreignData.flavorText: 「寝ているときは可愛いと思わないか？ まあ、それでも忌まわしきものには違いないんだが、少なくとも我々を殺そうとはしていない。」 ――タジームの凪魔道士、ノヤン・ダール
foreignData.name: 睡眠発作
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー）
各アップキープの開始時に、エンチャントされているクリーチャーがアンタップ状態である場合、それをタップする。
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignData.flavorText: "É tão meigo quando dorme, não? Na verdade, é tão detestável quanto antes, mas pelo menos não está tentando nos matar." — Noyan Dar, Mago Anulador de Tazeem
foreignData.name: Narcolepsia
foreignData.text:
Encantar criatura
No início de cada manutenção, se a criatura encantada estiver desvirada, vire-a.

foreignData.flavorText: «Такой хорошенький, когда спит, не правда ли? На самом деле, он ужасен как обычно, но, по крайней мере, сейчас он не пытается нас прикончить». — Нойен Дар, маг-баюн из Тазима
foreignData.name: Нарколепсия
foreignData.text:
Зачаровать существо
В начале каждого шага поддержки, если зачарованное существо развернуто, поверните его.

foreignData.flavorText: 「它睡着的样子真可爱，不是吗？ 其实它还是一样的可恶，但至少它目前没在想着要杀掉我们。」 ～塔晋息法师诺言达
foreignData.name: 嗜睡症
foreignData.text:
结附于生物
在每个维持开始时，若所结附的生物并未横置，则横置它。

name: Narcolepsy
originalText:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of each upkeep, if enchanted creature is untapped, tap it.

rulings.text: Narcolepsy’s triggered ability has an “intervening ‘if’ clause.” That means (1) the ability triggers only if the enchanted creature is untapped as any player’s upkeep begins, and (2) the ability does nothing if the enchanted creature is already tapped by the time it resolves.

Narcolepsy doesn’t keep the enchanted creature continually tapped. The creature untaps during its controller’s untap step as normal, then is tapped when Narcolepsy’s ability resolves during that upkeep. The creature may be tapped in response (for example, if it has an activated ability with {T} in its cost).

text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of each upkeep, if enchanted creature is untapped, tap it.
